title: Enhancing Practical Business Strategy Competencies: School Leadership Transformation Model Based on Professional Learning Communities (PLC)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can derive at least three core value systems of school leadership through PLC-based action research
Learners can design and implement leadership practice strategies that promote value alignment within organizations
Participants can develop and evaluate leadership change programs applying the ADDIE model
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
